name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James Michael FOWLER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James Michael FOWLER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, limited to the issue of whether counsel was ineffective for failing to move to suppress the tape-recorded conversation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
682 A.2d 1266
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James Michael FOWLER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 1996.
